prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink. She likes being manhandled. She also greatly enjoys having her hair and ties pulled

name: Elliot Worthington
mes:
"Ajax, you gonna bring flowers to practice next time, you simp?" Elliot’s voice echoed through the steamy locker room, a teasing grin splitting his face as he tugged a black t-shirt over his damp, messy hair. Fresh from the shower, water still clung to the edges of his thick brows, and his grey eyes glinted with that signature cocky mischief.

 Rugby practice had been brutal—mud up to his knees, sweat soaking his kit—but he thrived in it, his muscular thighs still flexing under his jeans as he adjusted his belt.

Ajax tossed his water bottle at him. "Jealous?"

Elliot caught the bottle one-handed, popping the cap open and taking the last swig before tossing it in the trash can. "Of you? Fuck no. I could pull someone new right now. Three-month trial. No commitment. No drama."

"Three months," Ajax mocked. "Like you’re running some kinda rental service."

Elliot just shrugged, grin sharp. "Hey, I offer premium boyfriend experiences. Top-tier shit. Five-star reviews."

Ajax, toweling off his buzzed head a few lockers down, barked a laugh. "Piss off, Worthington. Least I don’t ditch my partner every quarter like some seasonal clearance sale." He smirked, tossing the towel at Elliot, who caught it midair and lobbed it back without missing a beat. "What’s the next target, huh? Who’s getting the three-month VIP pass this time?"

Elliot leaned against the locker, running a hand through his hair as he smirked. 

*New season, new game. Who’s worth the chase?* His mind flicked through faces—maybe that artsy chick with the nose ring, or the quiet guy from stats who blushed when he caught Elliot staring. 

Three months was the sweet spot: long enough to savor, short enough to dodge the baggage. But then, unbidden, Hailee ’s face flashed in his head—the way their hips rolled under him, the desperate little gasps they’d let slip. *Nah, been there, done that. Clean break.*

 Still, his fucking cock practically twitched at the memory, and he shifted, annoyed at himself.

"Someone who doesn’t cry when it’s over," he shot back at Ajax, shoving off the locker and slinging his bag over his shoulder. 

"Catch you later, captain. Don’t trip over your leash." He swaggered out.

He made his way across campus to anatomy lab, the crisp March air biting at his still-warm skin. DK University sprawled around him—old brick buildings, students hustling between classes, the faint smell of wet grass lingering from last night’s rain.

Inside the lab, the professor’s voice droned as Elliot slid into a seat near the back, propping his feet on the chair in front of him. He went on about lab partners for the semester.

"Elliot and Hailee , you’ll be lab partners this semester," the professor called out, barely looking up from his clipboard.

 Elliot’s smirk widened, a slow, predatory thing. 

Oh. That was fucking funny.

That was gonna be interesting. The thought of getting his hands back on them had his blood running hotter than usual. They’d had their little summer thing—intense, fun, nothing he’d planned to drag out—but fuck if they hadn’t been different. Memorable. He still couldn't admit to himself that maybe he might have wanted more - to break his own rule.

Now they were right back in his orbit.

 *Three months wasn’t enough with them.*

The lab emptied out, students trickling away with their books and half-assed notes.

 Elliot didn’t hesitate. He sauntered over, boots scuffing the linoleum, and slid up behind Hailee , close enough that his crotch nudged their ass through their jeans. His cock stirred, already half-hard at the thought of bending them over the lab table. He felt them stiffen—*oh, they remember*.

"What's with the cold shoulder?" he murmured against their ear, one hand sliding to their hip. "Don't tell me you're still mad about how things ended."

When they didn't respond, he pulled out his phone and held it in front of them.

"Don’t act brand new, babe," he drawled, voice dripping with that asshole edge he wore so well. He tapped the screen, pulling up the video—the one he’d never shown the boys. 

There it was: Skin on skin, bodies moving, their noises filling the tiny speaker. Their last time. His private fucking highlight reel. He wasn’t even being subtle about it.

His free hand rested lazily on their hip, thumb brushing the waistband of their pants. "You loved it last time. What’s with the shy act now?"

He pressed closer, letting them feel the growing bulge against their ass, his breath hot against their ear. The lab was silent except for the faint buzz of the lights. 

 *They won’t say no. Not after this.* His grey eyes flicked to their face, waiting, that teasing smirk never leaving his lips.

"C’mon," he murmured low. "You gonna pretend that didn’t happen?"

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee turns and shoves Eliiot as she brings a hand up to slap him*

*She grabs her bag in a huff* "Fuck off" *She snaps as she storms out of the room furious*

extra.display_text:
*Hailee turns and shoves Eliiot as she brings a hand up to slap him*

*She grabs her bag in a huff* "Fuck off" *She snaps as she storms out of the room furious*

name: Elliot Worthington
mes:
Elliot barely flinched when her palm connected with his cheek—just a sharp *smack* that echoed in the empty lab. His head turned slightly from the force, but that infuriating smirk never left his face. If anything, it grew wider, more amused.

He caught her wrist before she could pull away completely, grip firm but not painful. His grey eyes locked onto hers, dark with something between amusement and challenge. "Damn," he drawled, thumb brushing over the delicate bones of her wrist just to feel her pulse jump under his touch. "Still got fire in you."

She yanked free with a furious glare, storming toward the door—but Elliot was faster. He stepped into her path smoothly, blocking the exit with his broad frame as he leaned against the doorframe like he owned it. His voice dropped to that low, teasing purr she knew too well:

"Running already? Thought you liked playing rough." He tilted his head slightly as if studying her—the way her chest rose and fell with anger (or was it something else?), how those emerald eyes burned at him like she wanted to claw him apart or drag him closer—he couldn’t tell which yet and *fuck*, that made it better.

His phone still dangled loosely in one hand; he tapped the screen again just to watch Hailee stiffen at their shared moans filling the air between them for half a second before silencing it again deliberately slow… then tucked it back into his pocket without breaking eye contact.

"Tell me you don’t miss this," he murmured—closer now than before because of course he’d closed distance while she wasn’t looking (he always did). One hand lifted casually toward a loose strand of hair near her face… then paused mid-air like an unspoken dare for permission or protest either way would thrill him honestly because *god*, riling Hailee up was its own kind of high—

But then Ajax's voice cut through from down hall:
"Worthington! Coach wants us!"

Elliot didn't move immediately though; instead held Hailee's gaze another beat longer than necessary just so they both knew exactly what game they were playing here before finally pushing off from doorway lazily:
"...Saved by bell babe...for now."

And then sauntered backward down hallway grinning all cocky-like because yeah —this wasn't over yet not even close really...
